criteria.text: Histogram of player height distribution in meters is built correctly
MSE function is written correctly and passes the asserts
The dependence of test BallControl predictions and real BallControl score on Dribbling score is plotted correctly
Linear Regression class is completed correctly and passes the asserts
Float number from Value field extracted
A sequential process of dropping highly correlated features was carried out. No pairs of features with abs(corr) > 0.9 are left.
Model was trained on train dataset, predictions were made for both train and test
Model performance was measured both on train and test data in terms of MSE or RMSE
Short report about the work done exists
Any other model except custom Linear Regression or sklearn.linear_model.Ridge(alpha=0) is used
Number of selected features BEFORE removal of linearly dependent ones is less than 10
Linearly dependent features were not removed before training the model
